creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
medium: Woodblock print (urushi-e); ink on paper, with hand-applied color and nikawa
text: The actors Ichimura Uzaemon as Soga Jūrō 曽我十郎 and Segawa Kikunojō as the courtesan Takamado 傾城高間戸 in the play Fuji miru sato sakae Soga 富士見里栄曽我, Ichimura Theater, 1742, first month
title: Actors Ichimura Uzaemon as Soga Jūrō and Segawa Kikunojō as the Courtesan Takamado
